name: Boctok-1 (Vostok)
description:
Brawl in space between Juri Gagarin and John Glenn. Push your opponent outside the system, or into the sun.

Boctok was created on Global Game Jam 2017 in 48h. We did a few cosmetic changes after that.

Controlls:

  • Player 1
    • keyboard arrows + space
    • XBox360 controller 2
  • Player 2
    • XBox360 controller 1

Source code: https://github.com/P1X-in/boctok
Developer page: http://p1x.in
